title: [ECIP-1054] Atlantis Hardfork Outreach Tracker

labels.name: status: accepted
labels.description: Ecip has been accepted and is awaiting Final status and activation

body:
### TL;DR
If someone pointed you to this issue, you **probably have to upgrade your Ethereum Classic node software** in anticipation of the **upcoming Atlantis protocol upgrade** ([ECIP-1054](https://ecips.ethereumclassic.org/ECIPs/ecip-1054)).

You have to run **at least** one of the following client versions:
- Classic-Geth, version **6.0.8-stable** or later: [etclabscore/go-ethereum/releases](https://github.com/etclabscore/go-ethereum/releases)
- Multi-Geth, version **1.9.2-stable** or later: [multi-geth/multi-geth/releases](https://github.com/multi-geth/multi-geth/releases)
- Parity Ethereum, version **2.5.6-stable** or later: [paritytech/parity-ethereum/releases](https://github.com/paritytech/parity-ethereum/releases)
- _Mantis is no longer supporting Ethereum Classic!_

**Projected Hardfork Date** based on 14.5 seconds block time:
- 9:00 am UTC  |  **Friday, September 13, 2019**

Please share this on all channels. That's exactly 1 month from today creating this tracking ticket.
